Statute.Title: Financial Institutions Depositors Compensation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Indemnité aux déposants de certaines institutions financières)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1985, c. 51 in force on assent 20.12.85 with respect to Canadian Commercial Bank and Northland Bank, except with respect to the CCB Mortgage Investment Corporation;

Item.Text: — the Act, with respect to the CCB Mortgage Investment Corporation, shall come into force on a day to be fixed by proclamation see s. 17 — Not in force.
